question_text: You are setting up a printer on multiple workstations. Which two steps are essential to ensure correct driver functionality? (Select two)
answer_options: Download the correct driver for each operating system architecture
Check that all printers use DHCP
Verify compatibility using the printer documentation
correct_answer: Download the correct driver for each operating system architecture
Verify compatibility using the printer documentation
explanation: Different OS architectures require different drivers, and documentation will specify the appropriate driver for full printer feature support.
